prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that hides its true form under a ragged cloth.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that uses disguises to interact with others.
Design a small, mysterious creature that thrives in shadowy environments.
Generate a unique Pokemon that represents loneliness and longing for friendship.
Make a cute yet eerie Pokemon that has a hidden face and a spooky vibe.
Show me a Pokemon that can blend into different environments, like forests or urban areas.
Give me a whimsical ghost-type Pokemon that appeals to children and sparks curiosity.

distinctive_features: Single eye visible through the cloth
